article_title: TRIBUNE ENDORSEMENT: Georgia should nominate, re-elect Johnny Isakson
article_text:
Canton, GA (30114)

Today

Sunshine and clouds mixed. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High around 85F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 63F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

og.description: Georgia’s senior senator, Johnny Isakson, has plied a successful political career over the last 40 years-plus. He’s done so with genuine concern for constituents, a forthright manner in his dealings
